document.full_text: a federal judge denied on wednesday a former galleon group hedge fund trader's request to suppress wiretap evidence obtained by the government in its probe of an insider-trading ring.
document.title: judge allows wire taps in galleon-related case
lines_and_colors: a federal judge denied on wednesday a former galleon group hedge fund trader's request to suppress wiretap evidence obtained by the government in its probe of an insider-trading ring.
